Uses of Package
com.smartsockets

Classes in com.smartsockets used by com.smartsockets
TipcBadArgumentException
          Thrown when a bad argument is passed to a method.
TipcCb
          Holds a reference to a callback entry.
TipcConnClient
          Handles client end of peer-to-peer connections.
TipcConnServer
          Handles the server end of a peer-to-peer connection.
TipcCreateCb
          The user interface for the RTclient's server create callbacks.
TipcDecryptCb
          The user interface for connection decrypt callbacks.
TipcDefaultCb
          The user interface for connection default callbacks.
TipcDefs
          Constants common to several interfaces.
TipcDestroyCb
          The user interface for the RTclient's server destroy callbacks.
TipcEncryptCb
          The user interface for connection encrypt callbacks.
TipcErrorCb
          The user interface for connection error callbacks.
TipcException
          Superclass of all SmartSockets exceptions.
TipcIOException
          Thrown when a low-level IOException occurs, such as a socket connection is refused or a socket connection is lost.
TipcMsg
          Provides access to message objects.
TipcMsgDecryptFuncInterface
          The user interface for message decryption functions.
TipcMsgEncryptFuncInterface
          The user interface for message encryption functions.
TipcMsgEnumerator
           A helper class that implements the java.util.Enumeration interface and returns TipcMsgEnumeratorElement when the TipcMsgEnumerator.nextElement() method is invoked.
TipcMsgException
          Thrown when an error occurs parsing a TipcMsg.
TipcMt
          Provides access to the message type class.
TipcOption
          Represents one option setting.
TipcOptionVerifyCb
          The user interface for TipcOption's value verification callbacks.
TipcProcessCb
          The user interface for connection process callbacks.
TipcProperties
          Table of TipcOption objects, which can contain another table as its defaults; this second collection is searched if the TipcOption is not found in the original table.
TipcQueueCb
          The user interface for connection queue callbacks.
TipcReadCb
          The user interface for connection read callbacks.
TipcRuntimeException
          Superclass of all SmartSockets runtime exceptions.
TipcSearcher
          The user interface for the search function required by TipcConnClient.search and TipcSrv.search.
TipcSrv
          Provides an interface to RTserver connections.
TipcUtf8Buffer
          A holder class for return object from the Tut.convertUcs2ToUtf8Ex method
TipcWriteCb
          The user interface for connection write callbacks.
TutXml
          Represents an XML object that can be sent within a SmartSockets message.
